gw.api.tree

Class TreeUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.tree.TreeUtil

  • public class TreeUtil
extends Object
    Provides methods for recursively sorting nodes within tree nodes.

    • Method Detail

      • findNode

        TreeNode findNode(TreeNode startNode,
                Object data)
        Searches a node and its subnodes for a given Object.
        Parameters:
        startNode - the root node from which to begin
        data - the Object to search for
        Returns:
        the first TreeNode found containing the Object, or null if it can't be found

      • getTreeData

        List<Object> getTreeData(TreeNode tree)
        Gets the tree data.
        Parameters:
        tree - the tree to traverse
        Returns:
        a List of the tree data

      • sort

        TreeNode sort(TreeNode startNode,
            Comparator<TreeNode> cmp)
        Recursively sorts with the given Comparator<TreeNode>.
        Parameters:
        startNode - the root node
        cmp - the given comparator
        Returns:
        the given root node

      • sortAlphabetically

        TreeNode sortAlphabetically(TreeNode node)
        Recursively sorts so that nodes are in alphabetical order within parent node.
        Parameters:
        node - the root node
        Returns:
        the given root node

      • sortInnerNodesAtTop

        TreeNode sortInnerNodesAtTop(TreeNode node)
        Recursively sorts so that inner nodes are at top within parent node.
        Parameters:
        node - the root node
        Returns:
        the given root node
